name: Le Necromancien
overview: Le Necromancien is an Adventure game, developed and published by Ubisoft, which was released in Europe in 1987. As the mercenary Kothar, You must find your friend, Balthar the Red, who has gotten himself into trouble. You travel to the town of Stragla to aid him, only to learn that the place is being terrorized by a necromancer.
